item.title: Rachel add a quote by Lucille Ball
item.description: "I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line." -- Lucille Ball

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Raymond Chandler
item.description: "I needed a drink, I needed a lot of life insurance, I needed a vacation, I needed a home in the country. What I had was a coat, a hat and a gun. I put them on and went out of the room." -- Raymond Chandler

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Omar Khayyám
item.description: "The Moving Finger writes; and, having writ, Moves on: nor all thy Piety nor Wit Shall lure it back to cancel half a Line, Nor all thy Tears wash out a Word of it." -- Omar Khayyám

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "But I love your feet only because they walked upon the earth and upon the wind and upon the waters, until they found me." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Chris Abani
item.description: "What I've come to learn is that the world is never saved in grand messianic gestures, but in the simple accumulation of gentle, soft, almost invisible acts of compassion." -- Chris Abani

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Laughter is the language of the soul." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where, I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I don’t know any other way of loving." -- Pablo Neruda
